thread.title: Dutton’s tasteless joke caught on mic
thread.title_full: Dutton’s tasteless joke caught on mic

title: Dutton’s tasteless joke caught on mic
text:
Microphone picks up Peter Dutton’s tasteless joke MALCOLM FARR news.com.au Microphone picks up Peter Dutton’s tasteless joke MALCOLM FARR news.com.au Dutton's tasteless climate change joke 0:23 
Immigration Minister Peter Dutton has been overheard making a joke about Pacific Island nations facing rising seas from climate change. Courtesy ABC News January 1st 1970 46 years ago /video/video.news.com.au/News/ 
IMMIGRATION Minister Peter Dutton has declined to confirm that he made a joke about Pacific islands threatened by climate change. 
But he doesn’t have to because a large TV boom mic that was hanging over him and Prime Minister Tony Abbott caught it all. 
“Time doesn’t mean anything when … you’re about to have water lapping at your door,” said Mr Dutton, referring to late starts at yesterday’s South Pacific Forum in Port Moresby attended by Mr Abbott. Other Stories
